recommended_degree: Ekonomi, Ilmu Ekonomi, Geografi Lingkungan, Geografi, Manajemen Ekonomi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability:
a.	Process daily order and input data using LAMP CRM system, Sales Force and Titan accurately and timely.
b.	Demonstrate capability in developing, understanding and maintaining product knowledge within business units.
c.	Capable in applying accurate material codes, guidance and measurements to Showerscreen and Wardrobe products.
d.	Provide reports and data upon request to various areas within business units.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Majalengka, West Java.
b.	Fluent in English, both in written and spoken.
c.	Min. D3 from any major.
d.	Experience in data entry or processing will be advantageous.
e.	Proficient in Microsoft Office and adaptable in learning new skills.
f.	Preferably able to interpret technical drawings, blueprints, and specifications.
